attributes.action: Require that DVD's with graphic and unsuitable images are displayed appropriately by retailers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DVD covers that are deemed graphic and unsuitable for children should be displayed at an appropriate height, thus ensuring that young children are less likely to view the images.

At present many DVD's rated 18 have very graphic images on the cover and these are displayed at a very low height and in some cases are near to the children's DVD sections. 

I would like to see such items treated as other adult material is in retailers, where adult and pornographic magazines are displayed at a suitable height.
